linkSkill.name: Time to Prepare
linkSkill.shortDesc: After completing Time to Prepare at least 1 time, then upon either defeating 8 enemies or attacking a boss 5 times, damage increases by 17% for 20 sec, for every 5 times you've stacked Time to Prepare.\nCooldown: 40 sec
details: Defeating 8 enemies or attacking a boss 5 times grants a stack of 'Time to Prepare'
After gaining 5 stacks, gain a %Damage buff

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Whispershot - Guardbreak and Reinforce
  • Execute - Reinforce and Enhance
  • Lasting Grudge - Reinforce

extraContent.title: Possess and Execute Skills
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, you gain access to your special resource gauge, Possess that utilizes Malice. Malice is gained periodically and from attacking enemies with Whispershot skills like Strike Arrow. Every 100 Malice, you gain a Malice Stone that is used to enter Possess state. In Possess state, enhances one attack granting it special effects. Possess skills share the same Skill Key and Skill Points (SP) as their regular version. Possess skills also have their own independent cooldowns from the regular skill

  • 20 Malice is generated periodically in 2nd Job, it is increased to 30 in 4th Job
  • 13 Malice is generated when landing a Whispershot skill, it is increased to 18 in 4th Job

Below is all skills that have a Possess form:

  • / Strike Arrow (1st Job)
  • / Scattering Shot (2nd Job)
  • / Shaft Break (3rd Job)
  • / Falling Dust (4th Job)
  • / Unseen Sniper (Hyper Skill)
  • Dragon Burst (5th Job) - Always usable

Additionally, in 3rd Job, you gain a passive called Death's Blessing. Possess skills add stacks of Death's Blessing which new Execute skills will detonate one stack for a devastating additional attack. Detonating Death's Blessing will also grant a %Final Damage buff to Death's Blessing and Execute skills.

Execute skills as mentioned detonate one stack of Death's Blessings. When you defeat an enemy with an Execute skills or detonate a stack of Death's Blessing, the cooldown of Shadow Step (1st Job) is reset.

Below is all your Execute skills:

  • Phantom Blade (3rd Job) - Does not reset dash
  • Tearing Knife (3rd Job)
  • Chain Sickle (4th Job)
  • Poison Needle (4th Job)
  • Unseen Sniper (Hyper Skill)
  • Fatal Blitz (5th Job)

Lastly, several skills have a recharging cartridge system where you have a set amount of ammo which recharges over time. Below is a list of all cartridge system skills:

  • Scattering Shot (2nd Job) - 3 Charges, 6 sec recharge
  • Shaft Break (3rd Job) - 3 Charges, 8 sec recharge
  • Falling Dust (4th Job) - 2 Charges, 10 sec recharge

primary.name: Facing the Past
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30. Move back to Toolen City.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Strike Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 70%, Number of Attacks: 5\n[Arrow Fragment]: Attack up to 2 enemies near your initial target 5 times, dealing 55% damage.
primary.desc: Fires several arrows forward
details: When an attack hits, fragments are created that seek out enemies that were not hit by the arrows
Occasionally when used, a Possess enhanced form may appear only in 1st Job

primary.name: Shadow Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 10 sec\n[Passive Effect]: Speed: +10
primary.desc: Quickly dashes in a given direction
details: [Passive]: Increases Movement Speed
Can be used to dash in all four directions using the Arrow Keys
Can be used while casting certain skills

When dashing you enter a Dark Sight state
  • When using this skill on the ground, pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the dash immediately

primary.name: Grappling Wire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, shoot a wire onto a platform, then use the skill again to move along the wire\n[Passive Effect]: Jump: +10
primary.desc: On initial use, fires a grapple that can attach to terrain
details:
After a wire is attached, re-using the skill by holding down the Skill Key will move you towards the grapple
  • Pressing the Skill Key again while moving along the wire will cancel the skill

Pressing the Skill Key and an Arrow Key together will direct the wire
  • This results in either a straight shot or 45 degrees upwards/downwards depending on direction
Using the skill in the air causes you to hover briefly

primary.name: Shadow Swiftness
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 10, Allows you to jump a greater distance.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Assassin
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power +40, Critical Rate +35%, Knockback Resistance +50%, Max HP +15%, Defense +200, Damage Taken -15%

primary.name: Ghost Walk
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability +25%, Speed +20, Max Speed +20, Jump +10

primary.name: Possession
primary.shortDesc:
Create 13 Malice when Whispershot skills hit, with more Malice created periodically.
Gather 100 Malice to obtain a Malice Stone. You can carry up to 2 Malice Stones.
Upon using this skill, consume either 1 Malice Stone or 100 Malice to enter a Possessed state for 15 sec.
 Cooldown: 0.3 sec
primary.desc: A special resource called Malice that generates passively and whenever you attack an enemy
details:
Each time 100 Malice is generated, you gain a Malice Stone (max. 2 in 2nd Job)
  • Consuming a Malice Stone will cause you to enter Possess state which causes your next attack to be in enhanced Possess form

primary.name: Dragon Fang
primary.shortDesc:
Duration: 40 seconds.
Kain’s direct skill attacks activate Dragon Fang, which moves towards the enemy and deals 100% damage 4 times. After activating, skill casts up to 7 times before returning. Damage against normal monsters: +50%
Max Summon: 3
Attack Mode Cooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: When toggled, periodically as you attack, you summon Dragon Fangs that attack nearby enemies whenever you attack
details: Up to 3 can be active at a time
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Strike Arrow II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 5\n[Passive Effect: Strike Arrow Damage: +89%p, Arrow Fragment Damage: +85%p]
primary.desc: After using , fire another barrage arrows forward by pressing the Skill Key again
details: Shares a Key Slot with and can only be used after it
Also creates Arrow Fragments
Additionally, permanently increases %p Damage of (including Arrow Fragments)

primary.name: [Possess] Strike Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 1 sec
details: Possess version of attacks are only usable in Possess state
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as and the same Key Slot as

primary.name: Scattering Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 4, Arrows Shot: 5. Each arrow can attack up to 2 enemies. Damage against normal monsters: +30%. If a single enemy is hit by several arrows at the same time, Final Damage decreases by 50% starting with the second arrow.\n1 Scattering Shot cartridge is prepared every 6 seconds and you can carry up to 3.
primary.desc: Fires a spray of arrows forward
details:
Uses a special resource called Scattering Shot Cartridge
  • You gain one cartridge every 6 secs (up to 3 at a time)
If an enemy is hit by more than one arrow, each additional arrow deals reduced %Final Damage
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: [Possess] Scattering Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 135%, Number of Attacks: 4, Arrows Shot: 6, Damage against normal monsters: +30%\nIf a single enemy is hit by several arrows at the same time, Final Damage decreases by 50% starting with the second arrow.\nCooldown: 6 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Arrows now home and seek out enemies with the highest Max HP
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Whispershot Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Increases attack speed of Whispershot for 200 sec.
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Whispershot Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Whispershot Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +40

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase DEX 60

primary.name: Strike Arrow III
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 5\n[Passive Effect: Strike Arrow Damage: +79%p, Strike Arrow II Damage: +79%p, [Possess] Strike Arrow Damage: +80%p, Arrow Fragment Damage: +60%p]
primary.desc: After using , fire another barrage arrows forward by pressing the Skill Key again
details: Shares a Key Slot with and can only be used after
Also creates Arrow Fragments
Additionally, permanently increases %p Damage of (including Arrow Fragments), , and

primary.name: Death's Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Max Duration: 90 seconds, Max Stack: 15. Blessing Materialization. Consume Death’s Blessing to attack 10 times with 140% damage and obtain merit buff.\nMerit buff: For 5 seconds, increase Final Damage of Death’s Blessing/Execute skills by 10% and create 10 Malice when Execute skills that can materialize Blessing hit.
primary.desc: Possess attacks apply a stacking debuff onto enemies that 'Execute' type attacks can consume to damage an enemy
details:
[Debuff]: Execute skills consumes one stack of the debuff and damages the enemy
  • Additionally grants a buff that increases the %Final Damage of Death's Blessing briefly and generates some Malice
When the debuff is consumed, the cooldown of is reset
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shaft Break
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 67, Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Piercing Attacks: 3\nUpon collapsing, pulls 7 enemies and explodes. Explosion attacks 10 enemies 10 times, dealing 140% damage.\n1 Shaft Break cartridge is prepared every 8 seconds and you can carry up to 3.
primary.desc: Fires an arrow forward that pulls in enemies before exploding
details:
Uses a special resource called Shaft Break Cartridge
  • You gain one cartridge every 8 secs (up to 3 at a time)
Arrow starts pulling in enemies once it hits an enemy or reaches max distance
Explosion is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: [Possess] Shaft Break
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 67, Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Piercing Attacks: 3\nPulls in up to 7 enemies. The explosion attacks up to 10 enemies 10 times, dealing 220% damage. The whirlwind attacks up to 10 enemies 3 times, dealing 40% damage continuously.\nCooldown: 11 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as

Now additionally leaves a lingering cyclone briefly after exploding
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: [Execute] Phantom Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Slashes forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed

primary.name: [Execute] Tearing Knife
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 4.5 sec.
primary.desc: Stabs forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Tearing Knife, the cooldown of is reset

primary.name: Lasting Grudge
primary.shortDesc: Upon using a Possess Skill or activating the death domain from Thanatos Descent, create crystals that remain for 10 seconds. The quantity created changes based on the skill used.\nEach crystal upon activation, Damage: 90%, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage against normal monsters: +100%\nCooldown: 0.3 sec.
primary.desc: While toggled, when a Possess skil or Thanatos Descent (5th Job) hits an enemy, crystals are created that will seek out and damage nearby enemies
details: Crystals activate whenever Kain attacks near a crystal
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Natural Born Instinct
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +20%, Attack Power: +40, Critical Rate: +20%, Enemy DEF Ignore: +10%, Status Resistance: +30, All Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Grinding
primary.shortDesc:
Max MP: +20%, Defense: +20%
Scattering Shot Damage: +75%p
[Possess] Scattering Shot Damage: +80%p
Dragon Fang Damage: +60%p

primary.name: Possession II
primary.shortDesc: Increases Malice created periodically by 30, increases Malice created when Whispershot skills hit by 18, and increases max Malice Stones you carry by 4.
details: Increases Malice gain rate
Can now carry up to 4 Malice Stones

primary.name: Advanced Death's Blessing
primary.shortDesc:
Upon defeating 50 enemies, recover 5% max HP.
Upon materializing Death’s Blessing on a boss, recover 3% max HP.
Death’s Blessing Damage: +135%p
Merit buff: Death’s Blessing/Execute Skills Final Damage: +10%, increases Malice created by 2 when Execute SKill that can materialize blessing hits.
details: Restore %Max HP whenever you defeat a certain amount of enemies or when Death's Blessing activates on a boss
Increases %Damage
Increases %Final Damage buff provided from Merit buff
While Merit buff is active, gain more Malice when Execute skills that activates Death's Blessing

primary.name: Falling Dust
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 410%, Number of Attacks: 8\n1 Falling Dust cartridge is prepared every 10 seconds and you can carry up to 2
primary.desc: Leap into the air and fire arrows down at an angle
details:
Uses a special resource called Falling Dust Cartridge
  • You gain one cartridge every 10 secs (up to 2 at a time)
When used in the air, you will not leap up

primary.name: [Possess] Falling Dust
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Shockwave Attack: Damage: 420%, Number of Attacks: 8. Malice Follow-Up Attack: Damage: 240%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 14 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Now creates a lingering dragon attack where the arrows landed
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: [Execute] Chain Sickle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95. Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 6. Finishing Blow: Damage: 220%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 12\nCooldown: 7 sec.
primary.desc: Swings a chain sickle forward and then slams it into the ground
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Chain Sickle, the cooldown of is reset

primary.name: [Execute] Poison Needle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 105, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 8. Afterward, Damage: 190%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 8. Continuous attacks deal 290% damage for 12 seconds.\nCooldown: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Slashes around before surrounding yourself in poisonous needles that apply a damaging poison debuff to enemies hit
details: When used in the air, you will float
Unaffected by Attack Speed increases
If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Poison Needle, the cooldown of is reset

primary.name: Dragon Scale
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 8% of Max MP per second. Hold the key down to maintain invincibility for up to 3.4 seconds\nCooldown: 40 seconds\n[Passive Effect: Bonus Avoidability: +30%]
primary.desc: When held, become invincible briefly
details: [Passive]: Grants an additional chance to dodge attacks
While active, you can move around
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Grinding II
primary.shortDesc:
Attack Power: +30
Strike Arrow, Strike Arrow II, Strike Arrow III, and Arrow Fragment Damage: +100%p
[Possess] Strike Arrow Damage: +85%p
Scattering Shot Damage: +75%p
[Possess] Scattering Shot Damage: +80%p
Dragon Fang Damage: +70%p
Shaft Break Arrow and Explosion Damage: +60%p
[Possess] Shaft Break Arrow and Explosion Damage: +90%p, Whirlwind Attack Damage: +15%p
[Execute] Phantom Blade Damage: +115%p
[Execute] Tearing Knife Damage: +115%p
Lasting Grudge Damage: +60%p

primary.name: Dogma
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +20%, Critical Damage: +20%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Whispershot Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Whispershot Mastery: +70%\nFinal Damage: +30%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +20%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Adapt to Death
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +10%, Boss Damage: +10%, Max HP: +20%\nDamage Taken: -15%

hyperPassive.name: Whispershot - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Whispershot skills

hyperPassive.name: Whispershot - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Whispershot skills

hyperPassive.name: Whispershot - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of Whispershot skills

hyperPassive.name: Execute - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Execute skills

hyperPassive.name: Execute - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Execute skills

hyperPassive.name: Execute - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: If you use Execute Skill during Death’s Blessing’s Final Damage increase, no attack will push you back until the effect ends.

hyperPassive.name: Dragon Scale - Efficiency
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recover 7% of Max HP per second during key down

hyperActive.name: Chasing Shot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Chased: 7, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 6, Number of Arrows Shot: 3, Damage against normal monsters: +30%\nCooldown: 25 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Fires several arrows that ricochets around one or more enemies
details: If there are no enemies, no arrow will appear
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

hyperActive.name: Unseen Sniper
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Key-down Duration: 1.4 seconds, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 175%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Shocks: 5\n1 Unseen Sniper cartridge is prepared every 40 seconds and you can carry up to 1.
hyperActive.desc: While held, charges to unleash a barrage of shockwaves forward
details: Holding the Skill Key will extend the range of the shockwave up to a max distance
While holding, gain 100% Knockback Resistance
Unaffected by Attack Speed increases

hyperActive.name: [Possess/Execute] Unseen Sniper
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Key-down Duration: 1.6, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Shockwaves: 5\nCooldown: 60 sec.
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
While holding, gain 100% Knockback Resistance
If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed but is unaffected by the Merit Buff
If the enemy is defeated with Sneaky Sniper, the cooldown of is reset

hyperActive.name: Incarnation
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 40 seconds, Damage: +15%, Attack Power: +15%, Knockback Resistance: +50%. Increases Death’s Blessing effect of Death’s Blessing-related attacks by 13.\nWhen other party members within Kain’s aura attack, the aura causes 6 Death’s Blessing attacks, dealing 150% damage. Blessing of Death cooldown: 3 sec.\nCooldown: 180 sec.
details: While active, increases the number of hits per attack of

While active, party members can trigger an aura attack while attacking near Kain
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: [Possess] Dragon Burst
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Max Key-down Duration: 5 seconds, Damage: 800%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 12, Max Attack Activation: 15. Immediately ends when all of the attack activations is consumed. Can change direction but need to wait 0.5 seconds to change direction again. Cooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: When held, unleashes a blast of arrows forward
details: You can change directions and move left and right while casting
You do not need to be in Possess state to use and will not consume Possess state to use

fifthMain.name: [Execute] Fatal Blitz
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Duration: 2 seconds, Damage: 600%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 12, Max Attack Activation: 14. When all of the attack activations is consumed, the effect ends immediately. Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a violent barrage of slashes forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Fatal Blitz, the cooldown of is reset

fifthMain.name: Thanatos Descent
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1,000, Duration: 35 seconds, Damage: +40%, Knockback Resistance: +50%
Malice created periodically increases by 40. Malice created when Whispershot skill hits increases by 35.
If your attack skill hits, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 3, Number of Arrows of Death: 6, Damage against normal monsters: +25%, Cooldown: 3 sec.
Using the skill again ends the effect immediately, while also activating Death Domain, which attacks 15 consecutive times, dealing 1,300% damage to up to 15 enemies. While casting Death Domain, you are invincible. Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Increases %Damage, %Knockback Resistance, and increases Malice gain rate
details:
Periodically, whenever you attack, you create an additional attack
  • Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

At the end of the skill or when the Skill Key is pressed again, unleash a final attack
  • You are invincible during this time
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Grip of Agony
fifthMain.shortDesc: Passive Effect: Upon either defeating 30 enemies or attacking a boss 25 times, you can harvest up to 5 Death Throes.\nActive Effect: MP Cost: 600, Required Death Throes: 1\nConsumes all harvested Death Throes to summon Hand of Agony for 5 seconds attacking up to 12 enemies for 1200% damage 6 consecutive times. Duration increases by 1 second for each additional Death Throe consumed. Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a zone of agony at your position that damages enemies within it
details:
This skill has a special resource called Death Throes which are gained from defeating enemies and attacking boss monsters and you can hold up to 5 Death Throes
  • Using Grip of Agony consumes all Death Throes to increase the duration of the attack
Ignores Damage Reflect

meta: Kain is a DEX archer class part of the Nova. Kain utilize Whispershots as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Kain can equip Weapon Belts
